name: Léviathan
description:
Very early alpha version and in french only.
Arrows to move, space to built. U to use "Etabli" to craft or eat, and i to change ite

Do not pay attention to graphics - not definitive ones.
Currently :
- You can craft around 50 differents items
- You can grow sunflow
- You can build cars
- You can build rooms and enter them
- You can shoot animals
- You can dig everything
- You can refine crude oil
- Old men will tell you things when you accomplish some events
- You can store thing in a chest (you cant see it in this video)
- You can cook thing in an oven (you cant see it in this video)
- and maybe other things i cant remember
